content.description: The route, a crack route. Its right near the waterfall so its often wet. there is opportunity to extend the route to have an overhang involved in the start. It is sandstone so careful of the possibility of broken holds. The crux: prob the 1st and 2nd moves. Otherwise its a finger and hand crack
content.protection: Trad definitely possible. Top rope might be better. Used a 3 inch tree for a anchor.
content.location: To the right of the main falls when facing the falls. flat rock near the base

content.description: The tallest route would have to be 25 feet. Its very sparse. Often wet, for its by a waterfall. very Pretty. Bouldering potential. Rock is Sandstone. Not a hot spot for climbing.
